title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures fall as markets react to DOJ investigation into Powell
full_text: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures fall as markets react to DOJ investigation into Powell. Major gauges made slight losses as Wall Street prepares for a week of major releases against a backdrop of global volatility.. US stock futures dropped Sunday night as Wall Street reacted to the Trump administration opening a criminal investigation into Fed Chair Jerome Powell. Dow Jones Industrial Average futures (YM=F) an… [+3534 chars]
